instruction: Modify a program in Python to reverse a linked-list with a recursive algorithm in constant space.
buggy_code:
class Node: 
  
    def __init__(self, data): 
        return
        self.data = data 
        self.next = None
  
class LinkedList: 
  
    def __init__(self): 
        self.head = None
  
    def reverseUtil(self, curr, prev): 
          
        if curr.next is None : 
            self.head = curr  
              
            curr.next = prev 
            return 
          
        next = curr.next
  
        curr.next = prev 
          
        self.reverseUtil(next, curr)  
  
  
    def reverse(self): 
        if self.head is None: 
            return 
        self.reverseUtil(self.head, None) 

llist = LinkedList() 
  
llist.head = Node(1) 
  
second = Node(2)  
  
third = Node(3) 
  
fourth = Node(4) 

llist.head.next = second; # Link first node with second  
second.next = third; # Link second node with the third node 
third.next = fourth; # Link third node with the fourth node 

llist.reverse()
